titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
1/13/2015--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for a joint session of Congress on January 20, 2015, to receive a message from the President.
